original_text: The wise men are ashamed, they are dismayed and taken: lo, they have rejected the word of the Lord; and what wisdom is in them?
korean_text: 지혜롭다 하는 자들은 부끄러움을 당하며 두려워 떨다가 잡히리라 보라 그들이 여호와의 말을 버렸으니 그들에게 무슨 지혜가 있으랴

sentences.original_text: lo, they have rejected the word of the Lord
and what wisdom is in them?
